critique: This document is an executive order regarding the inspection of tax returns by a House committee. It is difficult to assess its ideological tilt without more context, but it seems related to government oversight. It does not directly address immigration, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores will be neutral. The opening of tax returns to a House committee could be seen as a slight check on executive power, but it's primarily about oversight.
